name: Qt Creator
description: Qt Creator is a cross-platform lightweight IDE, including rates Qt Designer, Qt Assistant, Qt Linguist, graphical GDB debugger front end, qmake building tool and other functions.

en_US.description: Qt Creator is a cross-platform lightweight IDE, including rates Qt Designer, Qt Assistant, Qt Linguist, graphical GDB debugger front end, qmake building tool and other functions.
en_US.name: Qt Creator

zh_CN.description: Qt Creator是跨平台的轻量级集成开发环境，它包括项目生成向导、C++代码编辑器、浏览文件，集成了Qt Designer、Qt Assistant、QtLinguist、图形化的GDB 调试前端，集成qmake 构建工具等功能。
zh_CN.name: Qt Creator
